EmailTemplate.subject: Our special offer for your firm
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Intuit
Your special offer
A special offer just for you
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
Thanks for taking the time to speak with me today.
To recap on our conversation, QuickBooks Australia is currently running a limited time promotion specifically designed to help accountants and bookkeepers move to the cloud. This offer includes 10 Quickbooks Online Plus subscriptions for only $1 each for the life of the subscription.
Due to the unique status of your firm, I'm able to offer you 5 QuickBooks Online Plus subscriptions for $1 each per month. In addition, once you assign these 5 files to your small business clients, you'll be able to access another 5 files, also at $1 each. All you need to do is assign all 10 files within 6 months.
To discuss this offer further or to proceed with the promotion, please call me directly on {!User.Phone} and we'll get started.
Kind regards
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName}
